mention.text: Bank of Boston closed up 50 cents at $ 20.75 , while Mellon fell $ 1 to $ 26.25 Analysts expect that other regional banks may copy the action taken by Bank of Boston '' Cheryl Swaim , an analyst and vice president at Oppenheimer & Co. would n't be surprised if some of the medium-sized regionals decided to follow
Bank of Boston '' Cheryl Swaim , an analyst
